content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, thank you for taking the time to see the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Is there any discount available?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand, Mr. Trabelsi. However, as a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. I'm afraid I cannot offer any discounts at this time. Is there a specific price range that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a rent of 200 Euros per month. Can we agree on that?

Please note that I am a student and dependable, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

Can I negotiate with you on a few things?

For example, I can pay 200 Euros per month and in exchange I can move in on the 1st of next month.

Or I can move in on the 15th of next month and pay 190 Euros per month.

Please let me know which option is better for you.

Please note that I will sign a lease agreement and pay the first month's rent in advance.

I will also pay the security deposit in advance.

I am willing to pay more than 200 Euros per month if you can offer me a better deal.

Please let me know if there is any possibility to negotiate on the rental price or moving in date.

Thank you for your time.

I agree to the price of 200 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Mr. Trabelsi. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment, and I believe that the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this location is 250 Euros per month. I am sorry to say that I cannot accept your offer of 200 Euros per month.

I understand that you are a student and dependable, and I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, as a landlord, I need to make sure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. I hope you can understand my position.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and I wish you the best of luck in your search for a suitable rental property.

TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine
